results.name: E.g.f.: x^4*log(-1/(-1+x)).
comment: Previous name was: A simple grammar.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..450
INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 735.
mathematica: a[n_] := If[n < 5, 0, n!/(n - 4)]; Array[a, 20, 0] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Oct 07 2020 *)

ext: New name using e.g.f. from _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 07 2020
